website_summaries.verdict: It's expensive for what you get, but there's no question it does its job well.
pros: Easy to take hair dryer in and out
Inside is made of soft rubber to prevent scratches
Holds small or large hair dryers
cons: More expensive than the other products listed here

customer_reviews.title: Not good for my Dyson
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to hold my Dyson Supersonic Hair Dryer and thought it would work based on previous reviews. This thing is WAY too big! It does NOT hold a Dyson dryer upright and since the nozzles are only magnetic the dryer will be on the floor within a few minutes of hanging it. Perhaps it would be great for standard hairdryers, but it just did not work for me. Also, it sticks off the wall way too much and looks oversized and tacky in my bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse G.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, but will eventually scratch up your hairdryer
customer_reviews.text: Loved this hairdryer holder when we first purchased it, but then realized it chews up the handle of our expensive hairdryers putting scratches all over the handle and center part where it sits on the holder. Its padded on the inside but that wears away at the edges and exposes the metal. Gotta find a new one now, my wife wont use it for our new Babyliss. It aleady put a scratch in the handle. It is very sturdy, that makes to a 2 star.
customer_reviews.author: J. Roosa

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality hairdryer holder. My wife keeps her hair dryer in a counter-top cabinet with a roll-up front. She really likes how this keeps the hairdryer off of the counter so it doesn't take up so much space in the "garage".
customer_reviews.author: Huntsvegas

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, works!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, and looks nice in my tiny bathroom! Just don't try to "pop" a thick dryer through the crack. This is strong and will scratch/break it. Instead, put the CORD through the crack, then drop the dryer handle into the holder.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Worthe spending more on better quality!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect and lightweight. I had the spiral holder before and it took a lot of space and left scratches on my dryer. This one is rubber inside the hole itself so it fits in easily and doesn’t leave any scratches. Love it! Worthe spending the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: Karina L.

customer_reviews.title: Buy this product!
customer_reviews.text: Works GREAT! No more having my wife’s hair dryer cord hanging all over the place. It’s got a nice thin padding inside the ring so it won’t scuff or scratch the blow dryer. Looks really awesome too! Super nice product!
customer_reviews.author: Mojoe Gadgets

customer_reviews.title: Classy looking
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful design and good quality. I only give this a five star because the way you attach the holder to the bracket attached to the wall. Its flimsy at best, so you have to be very careful when you put the hair dryer in and out of the holder. The holder itself is heavy and very durable so they should have had screws to screw to the attached wall bracket.
customer_reviews.author: dennah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect creation!
customer_reviews.text: BEST product EVER!! I searched and searched everywhere possible for a hair blow dryer holder that wouldn't require me to face the dyer downward, which causes the cord to hang from the top & just looks plain ugly. This is the ONLY product out there that allowed me to store the dyer in a way that the front nozzle faces me & the cord points to the ground. I hate the look of an erect cord. This gives a nice clean look. The holder is supremely good quality, heavy duty & and sleek design. I'm soooo happy to have this. Was exactly what I had in mind. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Admire24

customer_reviews.title: Problem Solver
customer_reviews.text: I am really glad that I found this. I used to have something that clipped on to the side of my counter top that held all of my styling tools. After a bathroom remodel that gadget doesn't have anywhere to clip onto in the bathroom. This has been a big help because the hairdryer is my most frequently used tool and because if its size and bulkiness it was constantly in the way. Now it is hung conveniently on the wall and is no longer a hassle every morning. Also the piece itself seems to be good quality, is very pretty and coordinates with the other fixtures in the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: April 90127

customer_reviews.title: Style and function
customer_reviews.text: Will easily hold most hair dryers. The chrome finish looks great and is very easy to install with the supplied hardware. It took just minutes to put up. I would certainly recommend this product for its function and design.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but well built and has padded inner lining .
customer_reviews.text: Pricey but is sold and well built. We used to have a dryer wall mounted and it broke so bought a new dryer and needed a wall mount the opening is large enough to hold the biggest dry yet by design even small compacts would fit. For a simple item its pricey almost as much as the dryer we bought. But is padded inside so it wont scratch like some do.
customer_reviews.author: Paul's Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: The holder is very sturdy and holds my hair dryer out of the way, yet it's easy to get to when I want to use it. We installed it below counter level so it is mostly out of eyesight when not in use, but still handy to get to.
customer_reviews.author: Traci Weiland

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great storage place for the hairdryer in the closet.
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it! Puts the hairdryer on the wall in the closet so that it is easy to retrieve and the end doesn't keep getting knocked off of it.
customer_reviews.author: James A.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice once installed
customer_reviews.text: A bit tricky to install properly but once done it's so nice to have my hair dryer easily accessible and off my vanity counter. If you have the room to install one of these, I recommend highly.
customer_reviews.author: MD in Los Angeles

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but pricey
customer_reviews.text: The holding loop is huge. Way too big for Dyson Hair Dryer. Quality seems good but the $16 holder also has just as good of quality. So, I'm keeping the cheaper one.
customer_reviews.author: Wakart

customer_reviews.title: Useless hardware but great holder.
customer_reviews.text: Typical Moen quality but no toggle bolts are included for proper drywall mount. Easy to install and holds large hair dryers nicely. The rubber inner protects the dryer without any clanking noise!
customer_reviews.author: CatDaddy & Biatch

customer_reviews.title: Great hair dryer holder!
customer_reviews.text: The simple style looks great in our bathroom and holds our Babyliss hairdryer perfectly. I don't see any scratches on the dryer from it. Great design and easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Hairdryer Holder!
customer_reviews.text: This item is perfect for storing my hair dryer when not in use. I was so happy to find it in brushed nickel to match the accessories in my bathroom. It keeps it handy and yet not in my way. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: DeeinTN

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly but pricey!
customer_reviews.text: This thing works perfectly for most haridryers. No tilting and now wobbling of the hairdryer but it shold not be this pricey - as it is as expensive as the hairdryer it holds!
customer_reviews.author: Konea

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What Our Tiny Bathroom Needed!
customer_reviews.text: What a simple idea! It's exactly what we needed for our bathroom as we have no counter space (just a pedestal sink). The hairdryer was either continuously sitting inside the sink or sitting on the floor. This nifty little invention looks great and gives us a perfect holster for our previously "always in the way" hairdryer. This should be standard issue in all smaller bathrooms. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: A. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love having my hair dryer off the floor - out of the cabinet, and easy to reach...and the holder looks great (high quality - not cheap looking)!
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: I decided to return this it was larger than I wanted and ran out of space to put it
customer_reviews.author: Sthor49

customer_reviews.title: Easy Mount and Durable
customer_reviews.text: Nice holder for almost any blow dryer. It works great with a Revlon and Conair models in my experience. The inside of the ring is padded to grip and not scratch the blow dryer. Mounting is very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Maverick

customer_reviews.title: Really well made!
customer_reviews.text: I think this is the best thing I have bought so far this year! Really well made, solidly built, no sharp edges, with a little foam sleave to protect your hairdryer. very easy to attach to the wall. the "C" shape lets you holster the dryer either nozzle or handle down. I dont know why I waited so long to get one. Cetainly helped to de-clutter my bathroom sink!!
customer_reviews.author: Winnafrex

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to install on the side of my vanity so when you walk into my bathroom you don’t see the hair dryer laying around. It’s very sturdy and a great bronze color to match everything else. Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Loauise She

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product, installation was easy - drilled two holes
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product, installation was easy - drilled two holes. They provide metal anchors. One anchor head broke off when I gently tapped it to make flush with the wall. Looks nice - dryer fits easily in opening. Quality product. Worth the money to get better quality than some of the cheaper products in the $10-15 range.
customer_reviews.author: P. Versage

customer_reviews.title: Just what my hair dryer need
customer_reviews.text: The holder is about 3.25" in diameter. It serves its purpose by keeping my hair dryer organized where it should be when not in use and in reach when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 4 boys

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sturdy blow dryer holder. Found matching hand towel holder and looks great in newly remodeled bathroom. Love the brushed nickel color.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Blow dryer holder is functional and elegant.
customer_reviews.text: Functional and elegant presentation. It was easy to install and looks good in my bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Hampster01

customer_reviews.title: Does the job perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: My wife needed a way to hold her hair dryer so it would not take up counter space.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel S. Farkas

customer_reviews.title: Stunning looking and super easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Stunning looking and super easy to install. Followed the MOEN's installation guide video for towel ring and this done in 5 mins. Loving the look it gives. pretty sturdy. The inner ring has a rubber coating in case the dryer is hot. well thought construction quality. worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: TaraYoYoMan

customer_reviews.title: Worth the cost for daily convenience
customer_reviews.text: This might see, like a luxury item and the cost isn’t cheap, but... it is one of the most convenient daily use items on my bathroom wall when you consider how much room a blow dryer takes up on a 48 inch vanity top. Get one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but perfect
customer_reviews.text: Does the job it is intended to do and looks good on the wall. The price seems like quite a bit but it looks good unlike most Dryer holders so I think that it is worth it. There is some colour flecking on it as another reviewer said that might turn some off but we thought is was fine. Would have preferred a solid colour as the picture indicates.
customer_reviews.author: Cellens

customer_reviews.title: This is a fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of the hair dryer hanging around the side of the sink. I was not about to put it away in a cabinet when I used it on a daily basis. This appliance solved my problem completely. I merely reach out an inch and the dryer is right there at my fingertips! I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Murphy

customer_reviews.title: This is a GREAT THING!  Get your blow dryer off the counter!
customer_reviews.text: Where has this been all my life?? It's basically a holster for a hair dryer, and keeps it off your bathroom countertop. Easy to install, and once it's up, you'll wonder why you didn't get one sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Letitia Harris

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, easy to mount, padded so it doesn't scratch, holds all different sizes of dryers - and it looks nice too! More expensive than some, but definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: bunny

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Slightly bent it to fix the T3 Cura Luxe perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I went online looking for. It holds my hair dryer with large diffuser attached. I simply put the handle side in instead of the barrel. Works like a charm, is solid, looks good and was easy to install. As a bonus my little flat iron can also be hung on the post upside down that attaches the "cup" to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: SavedByGrace

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money...
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to spend the money on this hair dryer holder... It felt over priced. Now that it’s installed, I’m glad I did. Very sturdy and looks great. It seems like it will hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Hogan

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Instead of installing it so the opening was straight up and down, I installed it at a 45 degree angle. This makes it was easier for my wife to remove and replace the hair drier. It was simple to install. Anyway she is the one using it and if she's happy, I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: ACSanchez

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Padded, Great Looking
customer_reviews.text: one of the few products where the photos don't do the item justice. I was more than happy with my purchase. The holder is very sturdy and has padding on the inside instead of an all metal body. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Wainblat

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised and is sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very nice addition as it helped to organize our bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Average Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job and good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Works great to hold my blow dryer. So it’s not on the floor. I also liked that it was lined with a thin foam to protect the dryer from scratching. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: bombshell

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: This dryer holder is sturdy and does the job. It looks great with my brushed nickel fixtures! To be clear, the dryer shown is a small travel size dryer so it would clearly accommodate a standard size blow dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki L. Tilton

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It was a spurge for me. I didn't need it, but I was tired of never having a good place for my hair dyer. I was looking for towel bars, when wallah! It appeared. I love it! The Moen color is slightly lighter than the towel bars that I purchased, but most people wouldn't notice unless I pointed it out. I'll never be able to live without one again!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Bought this after reading reviews and I am very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after reading reviews and I am very happy with it. Quite pricy but I wanted something that would last and I think this will.
customer_reviews.author: Izzy hu

customer_reviews.title: nice holder
customer_reviews.text: does what it supposed to do and very attractive and nice quality ..inside is line with a rubber lining to keep it from scratching the hairdryer
customer_reviews.author: neurex

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Now that I have this my hairdryer is no longer in the way, falling in the sink, or on the floor - makes mornings much less stressful.
customer_reviews.author: speech teach

customer_reviews.title: Strong Shiny Holder
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, a little pricey, but since it’s a fixture, we didn’t want something chinsey. I have no idea how to use the screws provided, so used my own drywall screws.
customer_reviews.author: Esther

customer_reviews.title: Looks very expensive but it’s not
customer_reviews.text: This blow dryer holder is so pretty. It looks great with my dyson dryer
customer_reviews.author: lynne Blake

customer_reviews.title: Installation was easy enough with a drill
customer_reviews.text: I installed it on the side of my wood sink cabinet. Installation was easy enough with a drill. I use it for the Dyson Supersonic dryer, which slides in with room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Sean R.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: I kept knocking my hair dryer into the sink so this was exactly what I needed. Great item, would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Treadburners

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Keeps the hairdryer in easy reach while removing clutter and solving storage issues.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Wife likes it
customer_reviews.text: This is well made and looks good. We have limited counter space in bathroom and this takes an enormous blow dryer out of the way
customer_reviews.author: joe m.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Does the job. Wish they made one for flat iron
customer_reviews.author: Beverly P.

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: My hair dryer is not quite shaped to fit this, but I just changed the end of the dryer that went into the ring. The gap in the ring lets it adapt to many differently shaped hair dryers.
customer_reviews.author: jubry

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FOR MY DRESSING AREA
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this hair dryer holder to save counter space, of course. It does that nicely and matches my other fixtures, as well. It wasn't easy to find one of this color, so I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: CAShopR

customer_reviews.title: Really nice but did have to return it as the person ...
customer_reviews.text: Really nice but did have to return it as the person I purchased for found another solution. Beautiful quality and super nice looking. I considered keeping for myself but it didn't match my decor. I would highly recommend though!
customer_reviews.author: NYCin

customer_reviews.title: Quality A+, sticks out too far for me
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality but I feel it sticks out too far from the wall...I have another brand and it's very close and looks great...
customer_reviews.author: Razberriez

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy. Although the inside is lined, the ...
customer_reviews.text: Too heavy. Although the inside is lined, the lining is coming off at the edges and my blower is showing scratched. Would not order it again.
customer_reviews.author: Flor

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking component for the hair dryer - it easily attaches to the wall with a couple of screws. The inside of the holder is lined thinly with a foam padding (?) to protect your hair dryer from being scratched. It also looks great and keeps the dryer off the counter top. It's great - like most Moen products.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Holds the hairdryer for my girlfriend perfectly when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: TheMaster

customer_reviews.title: Just what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I needed. It was the size & finish advertised. Works just as I expected & looks great as well.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and attractive way to keep hair dryer handy!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Howard

customer_reviews.title: Solid quality- mounts like a premium towel ring but for your dryer
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality product that "neatened up" the vanity. I like the concept of hotel-like wall mount hair dryers but find them all to be of questionable quality and hugely loud. This takes my premium T3 dryer and keeps it looking managed.
customer_reviews.author: M. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our space
customer_reviews.text: This fit perfectly in my bath allowing me to hide my blow-dryer but keep it plugged in at all times.
customer_reviews.author: Prima Donna

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love this holder. It's perfect for my blow dryer and looks nice. I'm very glad I bought it. It's much better than leaving your blow dryer on the bathroom counter (or putting it away every day!).
customer_reviews.author: ranchomaia

customer_reviews.title: Great space saving device
customer_reviews.text: Love having the dryer out of the way and off the counter. I actually mounted this under my make up vanity, on the side wall so ecpven the cord stays off the counter.
customer_reviews.author: lori

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great product, didn't notice the rubber inside but it works great as protection for the hair dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Professor Percival

customer_reviews.title: and sturdy. It matches my faucet
customer_reviews.text: I have a pedestal sink, and no bathroom cabinets to hide my dryer. All of the other holders I have seen hook on to the inside cabinets or are tack cheap metal. Its modern, high quality, and sturdy. It matches my faucet, tp holder, and towel holder. Spend the extra money and by a Moen.
customer_reviews.author: Abbie

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Needed a way to de-clutter vanity. Next hair dryer purchase will be with retractable cord.
customer_reviews.author: Ohio's Donna

customer_reviews.title: I love this, it's like I live in a hotel
customer_reviews.text: I love this, it's like I live in a hotel. No more blow-dryer lying on the counter, looking messy and taking up valuable space.
customer_reviews.author: squirrel1

customer_reviews.title: Great idea!
customer_reviews.text: Stout, quality product which should accommodate most hair dryers. I mounted this holder to the inside of my vanity door where it and the hair dryer are handy but store out of sight. I installed an electric outlet inside the cabinet to accommodate the dryer. My hair dryer cord is long enough to extend far enough for hair drying.
customer_reviews.author: Lake Lover

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: My hairdryer is now permanently out of the way, leaving more space on my vanity top. I can't believe I didn't buy one of these years ago. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: kathryn winiarski-cervino

customer_reviews.title: The item is well made and nice in person
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I had to return this. The item is well made and nice in person. However the size will only fit a small hair dryer like the ones from hotels or something.
customer_reviews.author: mammoth bear

customer_reviews.title: Just Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Ladies, this is something you need!. It matches perfectly with other bronze items in my bathroom. Plus, when I put my hair dryer on it, it looks a lot less messy. Try it and you will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon A.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive for my vanity and worked perfectly. Easy to install
customer_reviews.author: JSL

customer_reviews.title: just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: This holder for a hair dryer was a bit more expensive then some of the other items I was looking at. Thankfully I went with this one because its made really well and looks great. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed
customer_reviews.text: It is just a bit bigger than we expected, but it is just the right size. My wife's dryer is no longer on the floor in the way of the door. It is no longer taking up half of the counter-space. She does not have to put it under the sink to "put it away."
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's really nice looking, and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I should've bought this years ago. It's really nice looking, and easy to install.... The directions weren't very clear, but unless this is the first time installing something like this, it's easy to figure out.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Solid bracket and easy to mount
customer_reviews.text: Solid bracket and easy to mount. This came with all of the hardware needed and looks sharp. The wife is very happy to have her hair dryer hanging on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Nice and simple and works great
customer_reviews.text: Nice and simple and works great. My hair dryer stays out of the way on the wall looking pretty. It is a bit pricey but I like being organized and it was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Works at keeping sink clutter-free!
customer_reviews.text: Holds our hair dryer perfectly and keeps sink free of clutter. You can put handle or other side of hair dryer through/in it. The sticky pad on the inside shifted a little so some of the glue sticks to hair dryer but that is not a major issue at least it keeps hair dryer from getting scuffed up.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty5

customer_reviews.title: Serves its purpose well.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great alternative to the daily ritual of stuffing my hair dryer into a drawer with the cord wrapped around it. So convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Quebec2

customer_reviews.title: Like this in my bathroom
customer_reviews.text: Like this in my bathroom! Holds my blow dryer out of the way and the flat iron fits nicely on the arm too.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Simple, sleek design
customer_reviews.text: Simple, sleek design. Does the job with minimal footprint and a beautiful design.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy M. Little

customer_reviews.title: Moen excels again
customer_reviews.text: Like the quality of the holder. Very stable and looks classy.
customer_reviews.author: David L. Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love mine. I put my hair dryer in it when not using. It makes it convenient but not taking up space on the bathroom counter.
customer_reviews.author: KR

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for you Dyson Blow dryer
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new holder that would fit my new dyson blow dryer and it's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Judy Black

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice but you have to tighten it up at the wall occasionally.
customer_reviews.author: Coyotetraveler

customer_reviews.title: Very small and flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: It's been 2 weeks since I returned this product. Where is my refund?
customer_reviews.author: Angela Vang

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the bronze finish and it was very easy to mount.
customer_reviews.author: Dawnsd

customer_reviews.title: Great Hair Dryer Holder
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my wife and we mounted it under the edge of a granite overhang on the end of her sink vanity. Works great and installed very easily! It only works however, if you use it! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Schrade

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Much sturdier and and attractive than I expected. I use it in the salon. I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Bathroom organization
customer_reviews.text: This hair dryer holder is large enough for my short and fat hair dryer. So very handy on the wall next to the sink.
customer_reviews.author: R. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: It works beautifully-except it does scratch the hairdryer that I put in it.
customer_reviews.text: It works beautifully-except it does scratch the hairdryer that I put in it.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah A. Rypacek

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome addition to your bathroom for the hairdryer
customer_reviews.author: draimer

customer_reviews.title: It's a little too big & awkward
customer_reviews.text: It's a little too big & awkward, so we haven't even hung it up yet. Still trying to figure out where to put it.
customer_reviews.author: pegs3

customer_reviews.title: This is a sturdy hair dryer holder. It met all my expectations.
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. This is a great hair dryer holder. Easy to install and very sturdy !!
customer_reviews.author: John manzella

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this holder. It was easy to install and keeps my hair dryer out of the way but at the read at all times. I am happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gail H.

product_meta.title: Moen YB5170BN Voss Bathroom Hair Dryer Holder, Brushed Nickel
product_meta.description:
Color:Brushed NickelKeep your bathroom tidy with the Moen Voss Hair Dryer Holder. This hair dryer holder mounts to the wall, keeping your blow dryer easily accessible and out of the way. It comes with mounting hardware and a convenient template that help take the guesswork out of installation. This corrosion-resistant holder comes in chrome, brushed nickel, and oil rubbed bronze finishes. It is backed by Moen's Limited Lifetime Warranty.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Crisp edges and uncomplicated style features give the Voss(TM) collection an ageless, yet fashion-forward, presence. Each silhouette brings a confident transitional style to the bath.
